summary: Makes Whiterun more packed with 100 new lore-friendly npcs.
descriptionHtml:
[color=brightgreen]Welcome to my first mod! This mod has the same goal as the other mods such as : Populated Riften/etc which adds more npcs in cities to make them more packed.

Update:

Added a new file: Version 2. Adds 40 more npcs to version 1 totaling up to 100 new npcs to Whiterun. 

Installation: Just replace the .esp or let Nexus Mod Manager do the work.

Includes new classes to Whiterun: Retired Commander, Retired Guard, Beggar, Traveling Aristocrat, Nord Warrior.

Bugs: Some recruits are naked because there\'s a bug with the armor set, I\'ll fix that in the next version. But yea, I promised you guys I\'d make it 100 npcs within the next 2 hours! :)
So far there\'s only 30 different characters with unique names. I\'m not sure if it really matters on the names, since they won\'t put up much of a function other than making Whiterun look more packed. They\'re mainly in Whiterun Plains District since that\'s where you go to Whiterun the most often for Breezehome, etc. I\'m planning on adding to 100 npcs within the next 1-2 hrs. So stay updated! 


I\'m a bit new here, but I hope I can make some enjoyable mods like many other mod makers on here. Thank you! Please remember to leave a comment and endorse this mod if you liked it! 

Took like 2 hours for version 2. I hope you all like it.

Here\'s an update list:

Currently have: 100
Released: 100 (the latest downloadble file(s))[/color]
author: DinoCarbon
